text: Champagnegaloppen is a 1938 Danish musical movie directed by George Schnéevoigt. It is based on a musical by Hans Christian Lumbye and play by Paul Holck-Hofmann. It stars Svend Methling, Valdemar Møller and Agnes Rehni. == Other websites == * Category:1938 musical movies Category:Danish musical movies Category:Movies based on musicals Category:Movies based on plays
title: Champagnegaloppen
